backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister actor with extensive types for branding, tutorials, products, orders, community posts, user profiles, AI interactions, and initializes state including storage, access control, and a token system.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a no-op migration module that preserves product and Stripe configuration state across upgrades.
backend/token.mo: Implements a token ledger supporting minting, transferring, spending, earning, and querying balances and transaction histories.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists concise summaries of all major frontend files, describing their purpose and key behaviors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing the root mount element and loading the React application script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, authentication, profile-setup flow, global theming, and mounts global components like the AI chat tutor.
frontend/src/components/AddProductDialog: Dialog for creating a product with fields, image upload handling, previews, and progress tracking before submitting via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/AddTutorialDialo: Dialog for adding tutorials with title, description, difficulty, video selection or upload, and form submission to backend.
frontend/src/components/admin/BrandingSe: Admin UI for editing site branding text and uploading logo/icon images with preview and progress.
frontend/src/components/admin/HeroSettin: Admin UI to edit hero headline, subheadline, and hero image with upload and preview handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/PageSettin: Admin forms for per‑page titles, subtitles, and banner image uploads with preview and state tracking.
frontend/src/components/AIAssistantPanel: UI panel that periodically requests AI feedback during video playback and displays real-time guidance and suggestions.
frontend/src/components/AIChatTutor.tsx: AI chat widget that displays chat history, sends user messages, auto-generates canned AI replies, and handles scrolling and typing states.
frontend/src/components/CartDrawer.tsx: Slide-out cart interface supporting item management, Stripe checkout, token payments, and user authentication checks.
frontend/src/components/EditProductDialo: Dialog for editing an existing product, including image management, reordering, uploading new images, and submitting updates.
frontend/src/components/ExternalBlobImag: Component that loads and displays an ExternalBlob image with loading and error fallbacks.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main app layout with navigation, authentication handling, branding updates, and header UI including cart and balance display.
frontend/src/components/LoadingScreen.ts: Full‑screen loading screen showing a pulsating music icon and status text.
frontend/src/components/MediaLibraryMana: Admin-capable media manager that uploads, lists, and deletes video files with progress tracking and permission checks.
frontend/src/components/MintTokensDialog: Admin dialog for minting new tokens by entering a recipient principal, amount, and optional description.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for users to create an initial profile with username and bio, then save it to the backend.
frontend/src/components/RestoreProductsD: Admin dialog that restores a predefined set of product templates, uploading their image assets and creating product entries.
frontend/src/components/SendTokensDialog: Dialog allowing users to transfer tokens to another principal with validation and optional description.
frontend/src/components/ShareRecordingDi: Dialog for uploading an audio/video file, creating a CommunityPost, and tracking upload progress.
frontend/src/components/StripeConfigDial: Admin dialog to input a Stripe secret key and allowed countries and submit configuration.
frontend/src/config/appBuildInfo.ts: Helper functions to read and format build metadata like version, environment, and build time.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, stored identities, and AuthClient initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as branding, hero settings, page settings, media, and other domain entities via an actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind CSS layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for colors, layout, and component styling.
frontend/src/lib/cartStore.ts: Provides a Zustand store for managing a shopping cart, including adding items, updating quantities, removing items, clearing the cart, and counting items.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard with permission checks and tabs for managing branding, pages, media, tutorials, products, and platform settings.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityPage.tsx: Displays the community posts page with a hero banner, post listing, and a dialog to share new recordings, using page settings and post queries.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing hero content, featured tutorials and products, and navigation cards.
frontend/src/pages/LearningPage.tsx: Learning hub displaying tutorials with difficulty filters, video playback, and completion rewards.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Simple error page notifying users of failed payments with navigation buttons.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Success page confirming purchases, invalidating queries, and showing bonus token info.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile page showing identity info, token balance, uploads, and purchased content.
frontend/src/pages/StorePage.tsx: Storefront listing products with cart actions, admin tools, and product management dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Wallet interface showing token balance, transaction history, and token transfer dialog.
frontend/src/types.ts: Defines enums and interfaces for roles, tutorials, posts, page settings, and AI interactions used across the frontend.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helper functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes project state, required fixes, and feature requests related to restoring product display and Stripe checkout persistence.
